channel.title: ::saveall command?
channel.description:
Okay, my server don't have an auto save code on it. So, when I do updates it messes players up and backtracks them. Does anyone know how to make a ::saveall command?
Server is PI and project insanity.
Thank You

item.title: ::saveall command?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

When you update don’t just close out the command prompt. Use the ::update command if you don’t want a rollback. If you’re still having trouble you can just find the saving method and make it loop to all files.

Read full topic
